name: Welcome To... Chichester 2 - Part II : Of Frying Pans And Boxes
detailed_description:
Coming home from a hard day fighting against The Council Of The Unseen, the protagonist is surprised to find Grendel Jinx busy watching cartoons.

Reminded that he should be going on a super-secret weeklong meeting, the protagonist sets off, little knowing that Grendel has plans for him.

Meanwhile, Grendel's cartoon makes an impression on her, and she imagines what would happen if she used the weapons that the characters from the cartoon use, against the protagonist.

Includes the initial script for the DLC.

Includes the initial script for the DLC.
short_description: Grendel has plans for the protagonist when he sets out on a super-secret weeklong strategy meeting. Meanwhile, cartoons make an impression on Grendel, and she imagines what would happen if she used the weapons that the characters from the cartoon use, against the protagonist.

fullgame.name: Welcome To... Chichester 2 - Part II : No Regrets For The Future

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 upwards
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or later
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or later
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible sound card
